summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2931, for the improvement of Alonzo Avenue Northwest, from West 70th Street to West 67th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein a sewer of proper materials and dimensions, together with all appurtenances necessary for the proper sewerage and drainage of said district.
